name: Bagwell Marketing
tagline: A Full-Service Ad, Public Relations and Marketing.
description:
Located in Dallas, Texas, Bagwell Marketing is a full service advertising agency /marketing firm serving clients throughout Texas and the United States.
Bagwell Marketing Company has over 38 years of experience serving clients in retail, financial services and rent-to-own markets, along with other business sectors. We handle both business-to-business and consumer advertising. Clients range in size from "mom and pop" businesses to major corporations.
